articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Indian women’s blind cricket team wins gold in IBSA World Games, beat Australia in finals | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Indian women’s blind cricket team  showed exceptional resilience in the rain-spoiled match and ultimately became the first ever cricket winners at the IBSA World Games
articles.content: Indian womens blind cricket team created history on Saturday as it defeated Australia in the finals by 9 wickets and won gold medal at the IBSA World Games. The women's cricket team showed exceptiona… [+1822 chars]
